author: Rgijaba
title: why are so many reviews titled awsome?
review: this is a great set and comes with robot chef who i remember from season two, placktons robot custumer, and a weired green thing a call sheldon's personal transport, scared spongebob, keran, sheldon, and planctons paty walker. i wish thered be some thing on the lower level, witch is why this set didnt score a five.i like how lego decided to maks the blue glove holding the chum bucket, and the warning sine on the toxic barral keeps coming off, so i had to tape it on. same thing with the robot custumer.i also like how nice the doors are, because they, like in the show, move both in and out.the little tube thing you put spongebob in is cool looking, and i dont know whats up with the red and blue thing... overall, this set is realy only for spongebob fans, like me.

author: legospongepotter
title: My Review
review:
My last review was more like a review from memory so niw that I actually own this, I can make a real review. (note to owner of this website: please delete my last review for this set).

 

So anyway, this set is suberb. I'll start with the other objects.

*The two robots, Spongebob Robot and Customer Robot were awesome. They weren't really in any episodes so i'm glad Lego added them.

*Now the tank. It appeared in Atlantis Squarepantis so I really thought it was cool to have.

*The burger walker was also awesome, sort of like a spider made of burger.

*Spongebob and Plankton were cool. The helmet on Plankton is basically to protect him if anything blows up, while Spongebob's scared expression is funny.

*The red and blue catapult was okay, though I doubt I'd use it much.

 

Now for the Chum Bucket itself

  • Pros:
  • *Karen, Plankton's wife hangs from the wall and was cool
  • *Krabby Patty analyzer is awesome and just fits a Krabby Patty, but it's difficult to get out.
  • *A brainwashing deive for Spongebob to stand in while the robot Spongebob lays on some other device, waiting to change brains.
  • *Brainwashign devices spins
  • *The fist on top of the Chum Bucket was difficult to get on the Chum Bucket, but still a fun build
  • Cons:
  • Stickers fall off a little from this toxic barrel
